description: This file defines two agent classes, PatientInterviewAgent and MedicalAdvisorAgent, which are used in a medical insights application. The PatientInterviewAgent generates patient questions based on dialogue context, while the MedicalAdvisorAgent leverages a vector database to retrieve guideline snippets for medical advice.

classes.name: PatientInterviewAgent
classes.description: Generates patient interview questions based on the chief complaint and transcript context.

classes.name: MedicalAdvisorAgent
classes.description: Uses vector database retrieval augmented generation (RAG) to provide medical suggestions and guidance based on interview text.

methods.name: List[str] next_questions(self, chief_complaint: str, transcript: List[Dict[str, Any]])
methods.description: Generates follow-up questions for the patient interview, based on transcript content and chief complaint.

methods.name: List[Dict[str,Any]] advise(self, interview_text: str, max_items: int = 3)
methods.description: Retrieves relevant medical guideline snippets from a vector database and returns suggestions with rationales and citations.

ctags.name: advise
ctags.pattern: /^    async def advise(self, interview_text: str, max_items: int = 3) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:$/

ctags.name: next_questions
ctags.pattern: /^    async def next_questions(self, chief_complaint: str, transcript: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> Li/
